data.client_settings: Browser Canary (both Firefox 61.0.1 and Chrome 68.0) build number 21032
data.actual_result: The user that left or was kicked still shows up in the suggestion list, even after reloading client and clearing cache
data.expected_result: only users/roles in the server should be suggested as mentions
data.short_description: small servers (tested with up to 6 members) mention suggestion list will show users who are no longer in the server
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server or be in a small server - type @ in the message bar - see suggestions of users to mention - kick one of the members, or have one of them leave - type @ in the message bar again - see suggestions of users to mention
